str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Neuter Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: Prolongation from a primary verb, another form of which, matheo, is used as an alternate in certain tenses; to learn.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To convince, establish, give assurance to; pass: To be assured of. From pistos; to assure.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular

str2: Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

str2: Prolongation from a primary verb, another form of which, matheo, is used as an alternate in certain tenses; to learn.
